memberdef.name: SEAD_TASK_SINGLETON
memberdef.initializer: public: \ class SingletonDisposer_ { \ public: \ SingletonDisposer_() : mActive(false) {} \ ~SingletonDisposer_() { \ if (mActive) \ CLASS::sInstance = nullptr; \ } \ \ bool mActive; \ }; \ \ static CLASS* instance() { \ return sInstance; \ } \ static void setInstance_(sead::TaskBase* task); \ static void deleteInstance(); \ \ protected: \ static CLASS* sInstance; \ \ friend class SingletonDisposer_; \ SingletonDisposer_ mSingletonDisposer;

memberdef.name: SEAD_TASK_SINGLETON_IMPL
